Resources.name: Copper Ore
Resources.description: A pile of copper chunks and grit. With a solid smelter, you might be able to turn this into something better.

Resources.name: Wolf Skin
Resources.description: A light, furry section of skinned wolf. You can probably turn this into some light leather at a tannery.

Resources.name: Pine Logs
Resources.description: A pile of light pine logs.
